programme.title: Tricked (Canada) - EP 20
programme.desc: Tricked Canada is a high-energy family series that pulls the rabbit out of the hat and flips it on its ear. It drags magic off the stage and onto the streets as master magician Eric LeClerc goes undercover with hidden cameras, posing in a variety of guises such as store clerk, waiter or sales assistant to pull super sneaky pranks on unsuspecting people.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 - EP 5
programme.desc: Michael Carbonaro is a magician by trade, but a prankster by heart. Everyone is left stunned and delighted, even though they have no idea what just hit them.

programme.title: All Over The Workplace S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: All Over The Workplace offers children a unique opportunity to explore what it is really like to do the jobs they dream about when they get older. In each episode, two children get to do just that, meeting various celebrities and well-known role models along the way. They even manage to try doing the job for real, often with funny and mind-boggling outcomes!

programme.title: Welcome To The Wayne S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: Ansi Molina moves into the Wayne, an apartment building filled with strange and unusual things labeled as "Wayne Phenomena". He befriends siblings Olly and Saraline Timbers as they learn the mysteries of the Wayne and protect the outside world while contending with a spy cell seeking to exploit apartment's supernatural aspects for their own nefarious ends.

programme.title: Coconut The Little Dragon S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Fire Dragon Coconut, Gourmet Dragon Oscar and porcupine Matilda are always up for adventure! Nevertheless the little ones prove that sometimes the smallest can be the biggest!

programme.title: 身在异乡非异客 Strangers At Home - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) There's an estimated 200,000 Brazilians in Japan. Our host explores the Brazilian Town in Japan, experiencing their unique Brazilian way of life. Intermarriages are common, but how do their children, labelled "Hafu", identify with a society that doesn't see them as native Japanese? (重)据估计，目前有超过20万名巴西人住在日本。距离东京约一个半小时车程的大泉町，有“小巴西”的称号。当地居民每10人当中就有一个是巴西人。他们说的是巴西的葡萄牙语，吃的是巴西的食物，过的是巴西的传统节庆，但是他们可都是血统纯正的日本人。而日本对他们来说到底是故乡，还是异乡？.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Shandong's Liangshan was the setting for "The Water Margin" classic novel, which depicted the grand journey of 108 heroes. Host Danny Yeo immerses in this epic literary adventure and discovers the feasts and flavours penned in the novel. (重)古典名著《水浒传》里108位英雄，缔造出世代津津乐道的传奇事迹。豪情万丈的英雄气息，在中国山东梁山，不只可以感受得到，也品尝得到。这一集，主持人杨君伟登上梁山，赴一场精美绝伦的水浒飨宴。.

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 20
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Youjing questions Na-yan if she has any ulterior motive for appearing before them 20 years later. programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 13
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Haiying went for a company medical checkup and was sad to learn that her physical health age is older than her actual age. Haiying got drunk and her boss, Xiujing, had to take Haiying to her own home as she didn't know Haiying's address. Xiujing asked her brother Daojing to send Haiying to their home. Although Daojing knew that Haiying lives next to his house, he sent her to a hotel instead as he did not want his family members to know that Haiying is their neighbour. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)海英在公司的体检得知她的健康年龄比她的实际年龄老,很伤心。 她喝醉了，因为不知道海英的地址, 老板秀京只好带着她回自己家。 秀京希望道京送她回家。 道京的家人一直在道京家外面。道京只好把海英送到了酒店因道京不想让家人知道海英就住在他隔壁。.

programme.title: Love To The End - EP 25

She is more certain with her guess when both of them are less than forthcoming. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)佳英怀疑世娜就是正韩的前女友，于是故意去试探英玉和正彬，发现她们俩都支支吾吾，似乎有所隐瞒。.

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 26
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Jiaying finally finds out the relationship between Zhenghan and Shina from Emily. Though taken aback, Jiaying decides to keep the information a secret from her family as she does not want anything to affect the harmonious relationship at home. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)佳英终于从艾蜜莉那儿知道正韩和世娜之前的关系。佳英虽然很震惊，但为了保持家庭和谐，打算向家人隐瞒真相，也不跟正韩说她已经知道实情了。.

programme.title: 幸福方程式 The Joymakers - EP 12
programme.desc: In America, the homeless are known for a few things- either they are loonies, junkies or unemployed bums. In the coastal city of Eureka, California, however, this shunned and despised community has found a listening ear in an unlikely figure- a 70-year-old Chinese woman called Betty. (最后一集)在美国，无家可归者都被贴上一个标签：他们不是神经病患者，就是嗜毒者或窝囊废。不过，在加利福尼亚州的一个小城市，无家可归者却有一个愿意聆听、帮助、照顾他们的人。她叫做Betty，是一个年过七旬的华裔妇女。.

programme.title: Makan Xtrim - EP 1
programme.desc: Host: Nurul AiniEveryone loves chocolates but have you ever tried 99% Dark Chocolate? Is Dark Chocolate in the same league as Black Coffee or Bittergourd? These infamously bitter foods may cause you to turn away in disgust but can the traditional Malay herb, Jamu Akar Cerita, defeat all of them and emerge champion.

programme.title: Suamiku Mr Blind - EP 9
programme.desc: Ain feels disturbed after what had happened at Aidil's house. She stays away from Aidil and the office. Mel and Azman notice a change in her but remains apprehensive to approach her about it. Puan Azizah expresses her concerns to Pak Deris that she hopes someone will be able to take care of Aidil when she is no longer around.

programme.title: Berita 2020-2021 - EP 1
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Detik 2020-2021 - EP 1
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. The half hour program analyses and dissect issues of concern to the Malay-Muslim Singaporeans - be it at the community level, national, regional or global. Apart from raising awareness, each DETIK episode hopes to set viewers thinking and make informed decisions on matters that can impact their lives.

programme.title: Jejak Jenayah 2020 - EP 1
programme.desc: Crimewatch started its run in November 1986 and is the longest running English docu-drama series in Singapore. The programme showcases crimes solved by the Singapore Police Force, features appeals for unsolved cases and dispenses crime prevention advice to promote public awareness towards trending crimes.

programme.title: SAGA S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Zack's mysterious stalker creates an anonymous IG account to smear him. Borhan is furious to learn about Zack's involvement with MMA and threatens to drop him from Akademi Waris. Ryan urges Zack to focus on winning his first MMA fight, in hopes of gaining Borhan's approval. Sofea is not impressed with Ryan's winning tactics for Zack. Farouk is disappointed that Zack ignored his warning about the stalker's intentions. Zack gives his all for the MMA match, creating a bigger rift with his father.

programme.title: Kultus - EP 1
programme.desc: Singaporean girl, Shakila, gets embroiled in a cult and tries to escape but is eventually 'deprogrammed? by a cult called 'ELIXR?. Her brother, Shafik, comes to New York to search for his missing sister. However, he is unable to track Shakila down and it seems like ELIXR is constantly one step ahead of him.

programme.title: Berita 2020-2021 - EP 1
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Sihat Oh Sihat - EP 4
programme.desc: Host: Suzairhe Sumari and Haizad ImranEpisode 4: High Blood Pressure & CholesterolIn the fourth episode of SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT, the two doctors raises the topic of high blood pressure and high cholesterol. Join them in their medical hub as they discuss in depth with the panel of experts and celebrity on what are the good and bad cholesterol. And what is the best type of food to consume in order to avoid high blood pressure and high cholesterol.

programme.title: Andainya Takdir - EP 16
programme.desc: Zali could not help but punch Airil for what he had done on Fatihah and chased him out. Rahmat has to tell Jalal about Norli's conditions after she starts playing with doll. While Normah without knowing the actual situation about Fatihah encourages Airil to divorce her. Rahmat send Norli back home and is shocked when Norli admitted her past action on Fatihah. Airil goes to Fatihah's parent house pleading to Fatihah for forgiveness. Airil's family meet for Raya but without Fatihah.

programme.title: SAGA S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Zack's mysterious stalker creates an anonymous IG account to smear him. Borhan is furious to learn about Zack's involvement with MMA and threatens to drop him from Akademi Waris. Ryan urges Zack to focus on winning his first MMA fight, in hopes of gaining Borhan's approval. Sofea is not impressed with Ryan's winning tactics for Zack. Farouk is disappointed that Zack ignored his warning about the stalker's intentions. Zack gives his all for the MMA match, creating a bigger rift with his father.

programme.title: Misi Beta - EP 7
programme.desc: Host: Danial AshriqThis week, three new teams - Badang, Sang Nila and Rajawali - has signed up to assist Kasilas in retrieving the auria that Kasilas need to defeat Kabakas. Will they survive the challenges and get enough 'auria' to help Kasilas?

programme.title: Makan Xtrim - EP 2
programme.desc: Host: Nurul AiniDo you think a macho man is able to take sour food? What if we give him Indian Gooseberry, Belimbing Asam, Sauerkraut and Umeboshi? Can he and our adventurous foodies stomach and swallow these sour delicacies? Or do we need to standby a puke bucket?

programme.title: Suamiku Mr Blind - EP 10
programme.desc: Rayyan assures Wani that he only has his eyes for her and not Ain after she challenges him to end their relationship. Mel persuades Ain to return to work. Ain and Aidil's relationship turns sour after he learns that Ain is going to get engaged to Rayyan.

programme.title: Berita 2020-2021 - EP 2
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Kembara Kasih - EP 1
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Dalina's journey of love begins in one of the most difficult slums in the world - 'Ulingan' in Manila. 'Ulingan' means 'charcoal factory' and most residents make their living through illegal charcoal making. Here, children play, breathe, and work in smoggy conditions without protection and many are too poor to go to school. On their off-days, the children head over to the dumpsite to scavenge for 'pag pag', which is fast food that does not decompose after being dumped. Dalina is thrown out of her comfort zone as she tries to encourage one little boy to go to school. Together with her fellow volunteer and mentor, Syahirah, Dalina makes her first attempt to do volunteer work in Manila.

programme.title: Poskad Dari Alhambra - EP 6
programme.desc: The appearance of unnamed postcards from Spain sets Nabilah off to an adventure to Cordoba but was greeted with bitter shock when she met her birth mother and discovered she was adopted.

programme.title: Kultus - EP 2
programme.desc: Syafik realises something is amiss and decides to travel to New York City to look for Syakilla. Syafik tries to get help from Hana, his ex-girlfriend, but finds Maira, Hanas roommate, instead. Syakillas roommate, Elia, tries to help Syafik but ends up in trouble instead.

programme.title: Berita 2020-2021 - EP 2
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Ayuh Bersenam!
programme.desc: Guest: Chen Shu Cheng - Hong.

programme.title: Ayuh Sihat Bersama! (Get Fit With Me) - EP 3
programme.desc: Host: Shahril WahidOvercome COVID-19 by staying healthy together. Hosted by Shahril Wahid, this specially produced 5 episode series will share exercises to build immunity and strengthen muscles as well as healthy recipes. Hear from our doctors on important information on COVID-19 and how to overcome it.Know what a normal temperature reading is and when you need to go to the doctor. Learn the forms of exercises that you can do to strengthen your core. Also, sharing a healthy recipe using an eggplant. What do you need to do to increase your body immunity?

programme.title: My Coffee Prince - EP 1
programme.desc: Raikal has a strained relationship with his father. When his grandmother Puan Sri Kalsom's days are numbered due to cancer, she wants Raikal to get married before he can inherit all her wealth. Pressured, Raikal tries to find someone who can fit in into his life.

programme.title: Poskad Dari Alhambra - EP 6
programme.desc: Jose is disheartened to know Sara is engaged to be married soon and opts to distant himself, leaving Sara to pursuit her lost umrah project alone. Sara is at a loss about her true feelings….

programme.title: Misi Beta - EP 8
programme.desc: Host: Danial AshriqThis week, the teams - Srikandi, Dua N and Wira - has proven to be the best of the best and it's up to them to once again assist Kasilas in retrieving the auria that Kasilas need to defeat Kabakas. Will they finally get enough 'auria' to help Kasilas defeat Kabakas?

programme.title: Top 5 Makan - EP 11
programme.desc: Host: Dayana RozaTop 5 Makan lists out the best places to eat in Klang Valley - from Burgers and Seafood to Western and Nasi Lemak. Hosted by Dayana Roza, this show will showcase different great versions of a dish there can be. Celebrate the best of its kind and see how your favourite dishes are given a unique twist.

programme.title: Suamiku Mr Blind - EP 11
programme.desc: Ain is stumped for words when questioned by Aidil as to what makes her fall in love with Rayyan. Puan Azizah is living with guilt and regret as she keeps thinking Aidil's misfortune is caused by her. Rayyan introduces Wani as his adopted younger sister to Ain.

programme.title: Kelab Prefect - EP 4
programme.desc: Farah quarrels with a customer at the minimart. Kael insults Adam when he comes to his house and Alia scolds Kael. Cikgu Taufiq declares Adam as the head of the jumble sale project. Kael disagrees and determines to get more sales than Adam.

programme.title: Kau Yang Satu
programme.desc: Datuk Mustaza's shipwrecked boat is saved by a fisherman named Sulaiman while he is out fishing at the South China Sea. Datuk Mustaza feels indebted, and wishes to have their children marry each other. However, his son Taufik refuses the idea as he already has a girlfriend named Isabella. Similarly, Sulaiman's daughter Salina also rejects the idea as she is interested in Zulkifli. However, at the end of the day, both of them have no choice but to abide to the wishes of their parents.

programme.title: Dimensi Cergas
programme.desc: Tonton teknik-teknik meningkatkan kecergasan seperti latihan kecergasan rintangan tinggi dan Senaman Tabata dalam dimensi cergas.

programme.title: Refleksi Aktif
programme.desc: Bersama hos Fariha Razak menyelami latihan-latihan yang dilaksanakan oleh atlet-atlet berprestasi tinggi dalam meningkatkan prestasi mereka.

programme.title: Smart Parents
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan motivasi yang akan membincangkan tentang tips ibu-bapa bijak anak hebat. Episod kali ini membincangkan topik 'Biar Rumah Kecil Asalkan Anak Tak Degil' bersama hos Zaid Mohamad.

programme.title: Bakul Telur Emas
programme.desc: Bakul Telur Emas pada minggu ini membincangkan tentang topik Duit Dalam Kocek bersama Alwi Adam seorang Pakar Perunding Kewangan.

programme.title: Rencah Hidup
programme.desc: Bersama pengacara, Nadia Hasnan menelusuri kisah keinsafan daripada insan yang pernah melakukan jenayah dan kesalahan dalam episod Rencah Hidup.

programme.title: Hijau Dot Com
programme.desc: Hijau Dot Com memaparkan tentang penggunaan sumber alam semula jadi, pengurusan hijau berteraskan konsep mesra alam dan potensi sisa menjadi bahan baharu.

programme.title: Al Mulki Nusantara
programme.desc: Kembali ke masa lampau dan saksikan kehebatan kerajaan Melayu lama seperti Melaka, Acheh dan Pasai di seluruh Nusantara dalam episod Al-Mulki Nusantara.

programme.title: Doktor Pokok
programme.desc: Hos Doktor Pokok, Heliza Helmi akan berkongsi tentang penyakit tanaman pelihara dan teknik mencegah dan merawat penyakit pokok.

programme.title: Cina Muslim Malaysia
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Iswan Ismail, episod ini meneroka sejarah kedatangan muslim cina ke Malaysia semenjak zaman Laksamana Cheng Ho ke Melaka. Antara tetamu bagi episod ini ialah Shirley Hay (Pengarah Muzium Cheng Ho, Melaka), Profesor Dr. Taufiq Yap (Pengerusi Persatuan Cina Muslim Malaysia (MACMA)) dan Nurcaren ( Setiausaha Persatuan Cina Muslim Melaka).

programme.title: Psikosis
programme.desc: Psikosis adalah sebuah rancangan yang memaparkan kisah-kisah, pengalaman dan rawatan tentang pelbagai penyakit mental bersama hos Aiman Amri. Psikosis pada minggu ini mengenali dengan lebih dekat mengenai penyakit Skizofrenia.

programme.title: Denai Warisan
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang dihoskan oleh Zarif Kamil menjelajah serta mengkaji tempat bersejarah ketika zaman penjajahan di Tanah Melayu.

programme.title: Thundercloud
programme.sub-title: The history of surfing's perfect wave
programme.desc: The story of Cloudbreak, one of the most revered waves in surfing, which changed the big wave scene forever. Fiji's Cloudbreak is a seemingly endless left barrel which took the big wave scene by storm and drew surfers from around the world who were looking for the ultimate ride. But the story of surfing's best barrel runs deeper than the waters beneath it.

programme.title: Anna Gasser
programme.desc: Find out a few things about the Austrian snowboarder’s thoughts and feelings on her chosen sport. The Austrian snowboarder shares her earliest experiences of boarding on the slopes, the achievements she’s proud of, who and what inspires her and why she loves her chosen sport so much.

programme.title: Marcus Kleveland
programme.desc: Get to know one of the most progressive snowboarders on the planet – a teenager with the world at his feet. Get to know one of the most progressive snowboarders on the planet: Marcus Kleveland. He’s also a smart and thoughtful guy, with way less ego and arrogance than you might expect from a teenager with the world at his feet.

programme.title: Seppe Smits
programme.desc: Ahead of the Laax Open 2019 we caught up with Belgian professional snowboarder Seppe Smits for a chat. Ahead of the Laax Open 2019 we caught up with Belgian professional snowboarder Seppe Smits, who shared his early memories of shredding, his strengths, his weaknesses and more.

programme.title: Tyne
programme.desc: Watch this See. Hear. Now. session with UK singer-songwriter Tyne as she performs two of her tracks. Watch this See. Hear. Now. session with UK singer-songwriter Tyne as she performs her tracks I'd Like That and Crawl.

programme.title: Illa J
programme.desc: Watch this See. Hear. Now. session with rapper Illa J as he performs his tracks, Enjoy the Ride and 12AM. Watch this See. Hear. Now. session and interview with rapper Illa J as he performs his tracks, Enjoy the Ride and 12AM.

programme.title: Eli Hanneman
programme.desc: Enjoy the technically adept skills of Maui's teenage surf sensation, Eli Hanneman. Still just a teenager, Maui's Eli Hanneman is already doing incredible things on a surfboard. Enjoy his technically adept skills and take a look into the future of the sport.

programme.title: Kolohe Andino
programme.desc: Filmer Jacob Vanderwork brings us his best Kolohe Andino clips from their work together over the winter. Filmer Jacob Vanderwork brings us his best Kolohe Andino clips from their work together over the winter. Watch as Andino tears through the Hawaiian barrels.

programme.title: How to do knuckle jibs
programme.desc: Oscar Wester shows how to get playful in the park by adding knuckle jibs to your game. Step up your creativity this ski season as Oscar Wester shows how to get playful in the park by adding knuckle jibs to your game.

programme.title: How to get some airtime
programme.desc: Paddy Graham gives you the lowdown on how to jump cliffs and windlips. Paddy Graham gives you the knowledge you need if you're an adventurous freeskier looking to get air off cliffs and windlips out in the backcountry.

programme.title: As the Crow Flies
programme.sub-title: On the hunt for the best snow
programme.desc: Gigi Rüf and Elias Elhardt are on the hunt to find the best snow and terrain for snowboarding. Gigi Rüf and Elias Elhardt are on the hunt to find the best snow and terrain for snowboarding. Watch to feel the enthusiasm and stoke of being out on an adventure. Soundtrack: http://spoti.fi/2o435nU.

programme.title: KTM's incredible winning streak
programme.desc: In order to understand KTM's winning streak we need to explore the team's impressive history. The KTM Dakar Rally team can all agree that you never know what to expect in the world's most challenging rally. In order to understand KTM's winning streak we need to explore the team's history.

programme.title: Life off the bike
programme.desc: Hear from the KTM Dakar Rally team about life off the bike and how they like to spend their free time. The whole KTM Dakar Rally team began riding at a young age, but what do they do when they're not riding? Hear from the team about life off the bike and how they like to spend their free time.

programme.title: Trusting the bike
programme.desc: With bikes tailor made for the rider, Dakar Rally athletes must trust that their machines can take them across desert. With bikes tailor made for the rider, Dakar Rally athletes must trust that their machines can get them across the desert. Along with their bikes, the mechanics are the ones who keep riders moving forward in the toughest race.

programme.title: Brother
programme.sub-title: Around the Globe with Kolohe Andino
programme.desc: Kolohe Andino and friends shred the best waves of their lives. This is real surfing. This is Brother. What Youth’s brilliant film, Brother, follows Kolohe Andino, 21-year-old surfing phenom, around the globe with his crew of friends, The X-Men of Surfing, as they shred the best waves of their lives. Brother is sensational surfing at its rawest.

programme.title: Chris Lake
programme.desc: Anna Lunoe is joined by Chris Lake, one of the top producers in the world, as they do the unconventional. Australian DJ Anna Lunoe is joined by Chris Lake, one of the top producers in the world, as they do the unconventional and create an all-new sound.

programme.title: Encouraged
programme.sub-title: Courage Adams returns home to Nigeria
programme.desc: At age 16 Courage Adams turned pro, taking the BMX world by storm. Now, he returns to his roots in Nigeria. At age 12 Courage Adams started riding BMX, but by age 16 he'd turned pro, taken the BMX world by storm and made the most of his parents' bold move. Now, he returns to his roots in Nigeria.

programme.title: The Flare
programme.sub-title: Finding their own place in skateboarding
programme.desc: Take a whimsical look at the life of skateboarding with a group of young men just trying to not fit in. A jock, an outcast, a rebel and a princess: this modern-day Breakfast Club tell their story a little differently. Take a whimsical look at the life of skateboarding with a group of young men just trying to not fit in.

programme.title: The secret fan in Argentina
programme.desc: Argentinian football fan Diego Milner gives a camouflage lesson in how to infiltrate a rival team's area. Argentinian Diego Milner is on a waiting list to be an official supporter of his beloved team, Boca Juniors. Until then, he has to infiltrate a rival team's area. Here he gives a lesson in camouflage.

programme.title: In Chile you'll never play alone
programme.desc: Sebastian Carrera has travelled more than one-and-a-half turns around the Earth to accompany his team. Sebastian Carrera has travelled more than one-and-a-half turns around the Earth to accompany his team, Deportes Puerto Montt, in the extreme south of Chile.
